title: Sorry, Currently Moved to New Category

comments.author: Ossyrana.1637
comments.body:
Anhim.3156:

I would recommend bringing this up in another sub-forum, maybe https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/game/gw2. This portion of the forum is focused on the development/ideas of the API, which is a tool to gather information about the game/players while outside of the game.

I couldn’t figure out how to move it, so I copied and pasted it elsewhere…but then I tried to delete this one and it didn’t seem to work lol. Do you know how to erase this thread? Thanks luv! xD

comments.author: Anhim.3156
